alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:56PM EDT until July 27 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MONTGOMERY... SOUTHEASTERN LOUDOUN AND NORTHERN FAIRFAX COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FAIRFAX AND THE NORTHWESTERN CITY OF FALLS CHURCH IS CANCELLED... The storms which prompted the warning have moved out of the area. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However small hail and gusty winds are still possible with these thunderstorms. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Maryland...and northern Virginia. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Sterling Virginia. Remember, another Severe Thunderstorm Warning remains in effect for portions of eastern Fairfax County and the City of Falls Church until 7:30 PM.
